hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Nayru's Love#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Three things are certain: death, taxes, and forgetting a check.

HC (Malon).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #the Mirror Shield#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: When ASM is used to code a randomizer they should call it ASMR.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Mido's house#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Claim Check#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Fishing Pond#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Nayru's Love#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Megaton Hammer#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Second Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #Saria's Song#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #the Shadow Temple# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Claim Check#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #3# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Water Temple Boss Key# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.
